WeWork | New York, NY, | Full Time Software Engineer | https://www.wework.com/careers

WeWork is the community for creators.

We transform buildings into beautiful, collaborative workspaces that provide infrastructure, services, networking events and technology. We are expanding our locations and markets, both domestically and internationally. One of our goals is provide the digital and virtual offerings to enhance our membersâ€™ success.

We are hiring for all software-related roles in our New York headquarters, from engineers to PMs and designers.
